price: Kuma idan watanni, mãsu alfarma suka shige, to, ku yãki mushirikai inda kuka sãmẽ su, kuma ku kãmã su, kuma ku tsare su, kuma ku zaune musu dukkan madãkata. To, idan sun tũba, kuma suka tsayar da salla, kuma suka bãyar da zakka to ku sakar musu da hanyarsu. Lalle Allah ne Mai gãfara, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنسَلَخَ ٱلۡأَشۡهُرُ ٱلۡحُرُمُ فَٱقۡتُلُواْ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ حَيۡثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمۡ وَخُذُوهُمۡ وَٱحۡصُرُوهُمۡ وَٱقۡعُدُواْ لَهُمۡ كُلَّ مَرۡصَدٖۚ فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّواْ سَبِيلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā insalakha al-ashhuru al-ḥurumu fa-uq'tulū al-mush'rikīna ḥaythu wajadttumūhum wakhudhūhum wa-uḥ'ṣurūhum wa-uq'ʿudū lahum kulla marṣadin fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fakhallū sabīlahum inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
